session_focus: Implementing trait inheritance syntax for Patchwork parser
completed_work: Added super_trait field to TraitDecl AST structure
Updated grammar to support optional super-trait syntax (trait Name: SuperTrait)
Created TraitMethod rule for trait methods without export/default modifiers
Added type annotation support to function parameters (Param struct and grammar)
Updated AST dump to display super-trait and typed parameters
Added 3 comprehensive tests for trait inheritance
All tests passing (111 total, 3 new trait tests)
historian.pw now parses successfully with 'export default trait Historian: Agent'
key_decisions: Separated TraitMethod from FunctionDecl to avoid grammar conflicts
Added typed parameter support as bonus fix (needed by historian example)
Used head/tail pattern for trait method lists to avoid ambiguity
